channel.title: Turning the x10 cam into a web cam
channel.description: OK i have an old web cam (x10.) you plug the camera into a wall and have a recever at your computer or TV. Well atm it just takes pics,and i want it to be a webcam. SO my my question is,does anyone knoe how to make it a web cam?

item.title: Turning the x10 cam into a web cam
item.dc:creator: @cant_touch_this93 cant touch this93
item.description:
@cant_touch_this93 wrote:

its a web cam but it wont work as a web cam all it does it take pics.

Read full topic
item.source: Turning the x10 cam into a web cam
